Instruction: Beat eggs in a large saucepan and whisk in milk, sugar, salt, and cinnamon. Cook over low to medium-low heat, stirring constantly, until fully curdled and whey separates, taking about 20 to 30 minutes. Vigorous stirring will cause sweet scrambled eggs, hence, avoid high heat.
Strain mixture through cheesecloth over a bowl in the refrigerator, 8 hours to overnight.
